meanings.definition: A calcium channel blocker used to treat high blood pressure and chest pain.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed diltiazem to help lower my blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist recommended diltiazem for my chest pain.
meanings.sent3: Taking diltiazem made my heart feel like a calm river flowing smoothly.
meanings.sent4: The effect of diltiazem on my blood pressure was like a gentle hand easing tension.
meanings.sent5: After taking diltiazem, I could feel my chest pain slowly fading away.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a medication commonly sold under the brand name Cardizem.
meanings.sent1: I asked my doctor if I could switch to diltiazem instead of Cardizem.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacy ran out of Cardizem, so they gave me diltiazem instead.
meanings.sent3: Mixing up Cardizem and diltiazem sounds like a tongue twister waiting to happen.
meanings.sent4: Using diltiazem instead of Cardizem felt like wearing a different pair of shoes.
meanings.sent5: The transition from Cardizem to diltiazem was smoother than I expected.
